Description: Delve into the intricate landscape of cancer biology with the cutting-edge technology of spatial biology, employing the unparalleled capabilities of CosMx SMI and GeoMx DSP platforms. This research paradigm advances oncology by profiling highest plex spatial multiomics, simultaneously profiling 570 proteins and the entire transcriptome within tumor samples. Embark on a journey to comprehend single-cell spatial nuances, exploring over 6,000 transcripts. This approach not only achieves true single-cell spatial imaging but also revolutionizes our understanding of the molecular intricacies governing cancer progression, paving the way for personalized therapeutic strategies.
Location: Spotlight Theater B - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
SearchResultBody: ESP6B. Highest-Plex Spatial Multi-Omics – Eliminating the Blind Spots in Your Research

Title: Highest-Plex Spatial Multi-Omics – Eliminating the Blind Spots in Your Research
